statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT review, timestamp FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_name, review, rating, timestamp FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR customer_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE review IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, review FROM feedback_reviews WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, review, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating >= 3 AND rating <= 4 ORDER BY customer_name, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback
SELECT review_text, service_rating FROM customer_reviews
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE service_rating < 4
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 1 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text, service_rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE service_rating < 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback JOIN customer_reviews ON customer_feedback.customer_id = customer_reviews.customer_id WHERE customer_feedback.rating = customer_reviews.service_rating;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerReviews.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM CustomerReviews;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%best%';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE rating > 4;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating, review_text FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, created_at FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Reviews WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text, response_text FROM Feedback WHERE review_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 4 AND 5;
SELECT r.rating_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM Ratings r JOIN Reviews re ON r.rating_id = re.rating GROUP BY r.rating_name HAVING count > 10;
